headline: 3 Reasons to Sell Northrop Grumman and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Even though Northrop Grumman’s stock ($487.50 per share) has gained 7% over the last six months, it has lagged the S&P 500’s 13.4% return during that period. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
